## Themes

Customize the appearance of the slides using

-   Built-in [Reveal
    theme](https://quarto.org/docs/presentations/revealjs/themes.html#using-themes)

-   Modify built-in theme using
    [Sass](https://quarto.org/docs/presentations/revealjs/themes.html#creating-themes)

    -   Variant of CSS that supports variables and other features

Specify the theme and/or Sass file (.scss) in the YAML
